metadata.name: Suspicious User Agent
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious malformed user agent strings in proxy logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('user-agent')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('mozilla/3.0 ')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('mozilla/2.0 ')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('mozilla/1.0 ')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('mozilla ')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower(' mozilla/')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('mozila/')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 6.0; ms web services client protocol')) OR contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower(' (compatible;msie ')) OR contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('.0;windows nt ')) OR contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('loader')) OR lower(LOWER(http_request.user_agent)) in ('_', 'certutil url agent', 'mozilla/5\.0 (windows nt 10\.0; win64; x64; rv:60\.0)', 'mozilla/5\.0 (windows nt 6\.3; wow64; rv:28\.0) gecko/20100101 firefox/28\.0', 'https', 'erbium-ua-4ce7c27cb4be9d32e333bf032c88235a', 'x', 'xxx')) AND NOT (lower(http_request.user_agent) regexp 'mozilla/3\.0 .* acrobat .*' AND (endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.acrobat.com')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.adobe.com')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.adobe.io')))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious malformed user agent strings in proxy logs
